p: Staurosporine, chaetocin, and TSA were obtained from BioAustralis, and balyculin A was obtained from Sigma. For each of the chemical inhibitors, IC 50 was calculated as previously determined and detailed in Section 2.1 in Ansell et al. [ 18] in both MtzS and MtzR lines. All stocks were solubilized in DMSO.
